Actions.Name: Feral Frenzy
Actions.Effects: May dash 2 before and after this action.

Actions.Name: Bloody Spit
Actions.AreaEffect: Deal [fray] damage. If foe has vigor, deal [D] instead, and they are dazed.

Actions.Name: Feral Pounce
Actions.Description: The [name] gains stealth. Choose a foe in range 3. If, at the end of that foe's next turn, they are still in range 3 of the [name], it may teleport adjacent to them and deal 2 damage, three times, ending this effect and stealth.
